sourcesContent:
function Info() { return (

In February of 2023 I boarded a 14 hour flight from Paris, France, to Santiago, Chile, where I would spend the next 5 months as a part of my university semester abroad. I had the chance to study for a semester at Pontificia Universidad Cat√≥lica de Chile, one of the country's and the  continent's most prestigious universities.   During that time I also had the opportunity to get to know my new home, Santiago, and to travel throughout the country (and a bit outside). A big part of my unforgettable experience is due to the people I met there, however here I chose to focus on the places that I saw and that impressed me along the way (see the map attached).{" "}

Before getting to Chile, I honestly was not aware of the many wonders that this country has and I am very thankful to have seen some of them. I certainly hope to go back and get to know it more. Here are some of the impressionable places that I fell in love with and at which I made many memories. In the map below I highlighted the places that stuck along the way.

); } export default Info;
